xml.quote: Television is the triumph of machine over people. [#808080]Fred Allen (1894 - 1956)[/#]
Stay centered by accepting whatever you are doing. This is the ultimate. [#808080]Chuang-tzu (369 BC - 286 BC)[/#]
Red meat is NOT bad for you. Now blue-green meat, THAT'S bad for you! [#808080]Tommy Smothers[/#]
But they shall sit every man under his vine and under his fig tree. [#808080]Bible, Micah iv. 4.[/#]
It matters not how strait the gate, How charged with punishments the scroll, I am the master of my fate: I am the captain of my soul. [#808080]William Ernest Henley, From the poem "Invictus"[/#]
Thomas Jefferson still lives. [#808080]John Adams (1735 - 1826), On his bed, not knowing Jefferson had died only a few hours earlier-July 4th, 1826[/#]
Brevity is the soul of wit. [#808080]William Shakespeare (1564 - 1616)[/#]
Black holes are where God divided by zero. [#808080]Steven Wright (1955 - )[/#]
Never tell evil of a man, if you do not know it for certainty, and if you know it for a certainty, then ask yourself, 'Why should I tell it?' [#808080]Johann K. Lavater[/#]
An idea is a feat of association. [#808080]Robert Frost (1874 - 1963)[/#]
EXPERIENCE, n. The wisdom that enables us to recognize as an undesirable old acquaintance the folly that we have already embraced.

To one who, journeying through night and fog, Is mired neck-deep in an unwholesome bog, Experience, like the rising of the dawn, Reveals the path that he should not have gone. Joel Frad Bink [#808080]Ambrose Bierce (1842 - 1914), The Devil's Dictionary[/#]
New Jersey needs a hero. Bon Jovi does not count. [#808080]Kurt Angle, Gold Medal Olympic Wrestler[/#]
When someone says, 'It's not the money, it's the principle of the thing', it's the money. [#808080]Kin Hubbard (1868 - 1930)[/#]
Children are likely to live up to what you believe of them. [#808080]Lady Bird Johnson (1912 - 2007)[/#]
There is no great genius free from some tincture of madness. [#808080]Seneca (5 BC - 65 AD)[/#]
That's what I consider true generosity. You give your all, and yet you always feel as if it costs you nothing. [#808080]Simone de Beauvoir[/#]
Now cracks a noble heart. Good night sweet prince: And flights of angels sing thee to thy rest! [#808080]William Shakespeare (1564 - 1616), "Hamlet", Act 5 scene 2[/#]
Unlike those who pretend to be immaculate, fallen angels are usually more intriguing because their earthliness is heavenly. [#808080]Carl Polloi[/#]
Experience is what you get when you don't get what you want. [#808080]Dr. Paul Brown[/#]
The innocence of the intention abates nothing of the mischief of the example. [#808080]Robert Hall[/#]
If we had no faults of our own, we would not take so much pleasure in noticing those of others. [#808080]Francois de La Rochefoucauld (1613 - 1680)[/#]
The health of the eye seems to demand a horizon. We are never tired, so long as we can see far enough. [#808080]Ralph Emerson, Nature: Addresses and Lectures[/#]
To get the best out of a man go to what is best in him. [#808080]Daniel Considine[/#]
Education is a kind of continuing dialogue, and a dialogue assumes, in the nature of the case, different points of view. [#808080]Robert Hutchins (1899 - 1977)[/#]
I don't know if God exists, but it would be better for His reputation if He didn't. [#808080]Jules Renard (1864 - 1910)[/#]

My Father taught me how to be a man – and not by instilling in me a sense of machismo or an agenda of dominance. He taught me that a real man doesn’t take, he gives; he doesn’t use force, he uses logic; doesn’t play the role of trouble-maker, but rather, trouble-shooter; and most importantly, a real man is defined by what’s in his heart, not his pants. [#808080]Kevin Smith, My Boring Ass Life, 06-01-05[/#]

Millions of men have lived to fight, build palaces and boundaries, shape destinies and societies; but the compelling force of all times has been the force of originality and creation profoundly affecting the roots of human spirit. [#808080]Ansel Adams (1902 - 1984)[/#]
In university they don't tell you that the greater part of the law is learning to tolerate fools. [#808080]Doris Lessing[/#]
